create-folder.title:
A folder name must conform to the following naming rules:
  Folder name must be between 3 and 63 characters long.
  Folder name must start with a letter or number, and can only contain letters, numbers, and hyphen (-).
  Each hyphen (-) must be immediately preceded and followed by a letter or number; consecutive hyphens are not permitted.
  All letters in a folder name must be lower case

EnablePruneExpiredTokensJob.description: Enables the pruning of expired and invalid tokens/authorizations
EnablePruneExpiredTokensJob.title: Prune expired tokens

CronPruneExpiredTokensJob.title: Cron for the tokens prune job

FileExtensionsBlackList.description: File extensions prohibited from upload by the Platform (additionally to 'FileExtensionsBlackList' in appsettings.json)
FileExtensionsBlackList.title: Black list

FileExtensionsWhiteList.description: File extensions permitted for upload by the Platform (additionally to 'FileExtensionsWhiteList' in appsettings.json)
FileExtensionsWhiteList.title: White list

State.description: Persisted state of the main menu
State.title: Persisted state of the main menu

Language.description: Default language (two letter code from ISO 639-1, case-insensitive). Example: en, de
Language.title: Language

RegionalFormat.description: Default regional format (CLDR locale code, with dash or underscore as delimiter, case-insensitive). Example: en, en_US, sr_Cyrl, sr_Cyrl_RS
RegionalFormat.title: Regional format

TimeZone.description: Default time zone (IANA time zone name [tz database], exactly as in database, case-sensitive). Examples: America/New_York, Europe/Moscow
TimeZone.title: Time zone

UseTimeAgo.description: When set to true (the default), the system displays the date in 'a few seconds ago' format whenever possible
UseTimeAgo.title: Use time ago format when possible

FullDateThreshold.description: The time-ago format will switch to a full date format after a certain number of time units
FullDateThreshold.title: Full date threshold

Customization.description: JSON contains personalization settings of manager UI
Customization.title: The manager UI customization

ShowMeridian.description: Show time meridian indicator (AM or PM)
ShowMeridian.title: Show time meridian

Enabled.description: This setting allows you to globally enable and disable caching for the entire Platform application
Enabled.title: Enable or disable cache globally

AbsoulteExpiration.description: Specifies the maximum time the cached data is stored in the cache. Format: [-][d.]hh:mm:ss[.fffffff]
AbsoulteExpiration.title: Global lifetime of objects in cache
